Class Value<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.values.Value<K>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValueInteger, ValueString

    public abstract class Value<K>
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract value contained in the KV-store
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade
